snippet.title: The Chronicles of Riddick: Escape from Butcher Bay - Trailer
snippet.description:
You are Richard B. Riddick, the most wanted man in the universe.

The ESRB has rated this game Mature (Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Strong Language). For more information, please visit http://www.esrb.com/
